title: Brooks Koepka wins PGA Championship
description: Brooks Koepka wins the PGA Championship for his fifth major title.

title: 2 killed when plane headed for Hawaii crashes off Northern California
description: Authorities say two people were killed when a small plane headed for Hawaii crashed in the Pacific Ocean shortly after takeoff from Northern California

title: Berlin police investigate report of Russian exiles falling ill
description: The  conference was linked to a Russian opposition figure.

title: France pension protest held on outskirts of Cannes Film Festival
description: Though protests over pension reforms have roiled France in recent months, demonstrations have been kept largely at bay at one of the country’s glitziest events, the Cannes Film Festival

title: Soccer stadium stampede in El Salvador leaves 12 dead
description: Officials and witnesses say that fans angry at being blocked from entering a Salvadoran soccer league match knocked down an entrance gate to the stadium, leading to a crush that left at least 12 people dead and dozens injured

title: New trial ordered for man who spent 15 years on death row in death of 3-year-old boy
description: A new trial has been ordered for a man who spent more than a decade and a half on Ohio’s death row in the 2006 death of the 3-year-old son of his former live-in girlfriend

title: Civil rights groups warn tourists about Florida in wake of 'hostile' laws
description: The NAACP over the weekend issued a travel advisory for Florida, joining two other civil rights groups in warning potential tourists that recent laws championed by Gov_ Ron DeSantis and Florida lawmakers are “openly hostile toward African Americans, pe...

title: Biden looks to deal directly with McCarthy on debt limit as speaker slams tax comment
description: Biden on Sunday hammered Republicans over what he called "extreme positions" on raising the debt ceiling as the nation careens toward a potentially catastrophic default

title: 19 shot, 10 fatally, at car rally less than 100 miles from Mexico-US border
description: At least 10 people were killed and nine were wounded when an apparent team of gunmen ambushed a car rally in Baja, Mexico, authorities said.

title: Mount Etna volcano erupts, raining ash on Catania, forcing flight suspension
description: Mount Etna, Europe's most active volcano, is erupting, spewing ash on Catania, eastern Sicily's largest city, and forcing suspension of flights at that city's airport

title: WATCH:  Bee appears to 'wave' at toddler
description: A 2-year-old in Ireland was initially nervous of a bee until the bee appeared to "wave" goodbye back to the child.

title: WATCH:  Tree burns after lightning strike in Florida
description: A lightning strike set a tree on fire outside a Florida home that had livestock. No animals were injured from the severe thunderstorms, the home's owner said.

title: Animal rights activists protest octopus farm plans in Spain
description: Animal rights activists have gathered in Madrid to protest plans for the construction of a large-scale octopus farm

title: Biden: No debt limit deal solely on its 'partisan terms'
description: President Joe Biden says Republicans in the U.S. House must move off their “extreme positions” on the now-stalled talks over raising America’s debt limit

title: Afghan ministry says helicopter crash kills 2 crewmembers during patrol in country's north
description: The Ministry of Defense says an Afghan military helicopter crashed in the country’s north after hitting a power line base, killing at least two crewmembers

title: Extremist Israeli Cabinet minister visits sensitive Jerusalem holy site
description: An extremist Israeli Cabinet minister has visited a sensitive Jerusalem holy site at a time of heightened tensions with the Palestinians

title: 3 dead in Kansas City lounge shooting
description: Five people were shot, including three of them fatally, when a gunman opened fire at the Klymax Lounge in Kansas City, Missouri, early Sunday, police said.

title: Alabama police: 4 people wounded in exchange of gunfire outside Birmingham bar
description: Four people were shot and wounded outside an Alabama bar early Sunday in what police described as an exchange of gunfire

title: Zelenskyy: 'Bakhmut is only in our hearts' after Ukraine loses control of destroyed city to Russia
description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy says that he believes that Russia has taken control of the eastern city of Bakhmut

title: Using 'he/him,' 'she/her' in emails got 2 dorm directors fired at small New York Christian college
description: The firing of two employees at a religious school in western New York is fanning the culture wars roiling parts of the United States

title: Polls open in Greece's first election since international bailout spending controls ended
description: Polls open in Greece's first election since international bailout spending controls ended

title: Biden to call McCarthy to discuss debt ceiling after G7 summit
description: There are no meetings currently scheduled for Saturday between White House and GOP negotiators, multiple sources familiar with the matter told ABC News.

title: Lawsuit alleges supervisor at homebuilding company brought noose to staff meeting
description: A lawsuit alleges a homebuilding company discriminated against three Black employees, one of whom reportedly attended a meeting where a noose was displayed.
